features: ADJUSTABLE WALL MOUNT: Check the dimensions of your device to see if it will fit with our adjustable wall mount - Vertical Height: Maximum 10" (no minimum), Vertical Length: 3.5"-10", Vertical Depth: 2.9" to 4.9"
TWO MOUNTING OPTIONS: Mount a device on the wall, behind a monitor or TV
COMPATIBILITY: The bracket supports devices with 2.9 - 4.9 inches in depth, VESA mounting for 75 x 75 and 100 x 100 mm VESA patterns, and supports devices up to 11 lbs
BEHIDE TV: Hide your wires and boxes to enjoy a clean, organized TV setup

DOES NOT INTERFERE WITH REMOTE CONTROLS: Don't worry about your signal from your remote control being blocked! Infrared Signals remotes, Radio Frequency remotes, and Bluetooth remotes will still work with the device behind the TV - you can test your device by holding it behind a TV and having a friend try the remote.
EASY INSTALL: Drill not required. Stud mounting optional. Includes all necessary mounting hardware.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The small device wall mount features the easiest way to have a clean and versatile setup to media players, computer, cable box, game console. The adjustable design is compatible with a wide range of media players, cable and satellite boxes. The wall mounting option frees up more space on your tabletop. Open construction provides easy access to power button, output jacks, and cables on either side. Designed to take good care of your small device, it is the best choice for you an universal small device mounted on the wall. With VESA Mount Bracket pattern, you can also mount small device to the back of monitor and TV FEATURES Heavy-Duty Steel Construction: provides extra strength and durabilityWidth Adjustment: fits a variety of appliance/device sizes and shapesVESA Compatible: 75 x 75mm, 100 x 100 mmSupports devices up to 11 lbsSupports devices with 2.99 - 4.99 inches in depth to fit a variety of devicesSupport small CPUs, thin clients, USB 3.0 docking stations, or USB hubs, Game console PS4, PS5Two install optio: wall mount or mount back of TV or monitorAllow easy access to the power button, output jacks and connections

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too loose for PS4 and PS3
reviews.reviewText: It advertises as compatible with PS4 and PS3 but the gap between the two plates is to loose for the thickness of a PS4, PS4 slim or PS3 slim. Make sure the device is 3 inches or thicker so it can stay secured properly.
